resources.string: "We need camera access to analyze structural cracks. Please grant camera permission to continue using this feature."
Camera permission is required for this feature. Please grant the permission in the app settings.
Take a photo of the crack that concerns you, and our app will assist you in capturing the ideal shot.
Upon image upload, our AI quickly analyzes the crack\'s severity in detail.
Get instant feedback on whether the crack is cosmetic or needs further attention.
Ensure even lighting without glare; natural light is ideal, otherwise use a steady light source.
Steady the camera, focus clearly on the crack, and use macro mode for close-ups.
Include the entire length and surroundings of the crack in the frame to provide context. Take the photo straight on and avoid angles for accurate analysis.
